Articles.Content: Does anyone know of a way to see information on your kerbals without going back to the astronaut building? For example, I've just docked a ship to my station and I'm wondering which kerbals I should transfer over for my next mission.. but I've no idea who is what career or level. Is there a way to see this information in the stock game, or a mod that anyone recommends?

If you go to map view, while focusing on your ship, click on the button middle right of the screen to display info on your ship, there should a sub-menu there displaying info on Kerbonauts on board.

Not sure though if level or career is shown.

The map screen does show profession and level. But I do wish there was a way to tell at a glance.

I'd love it if each type had a different colored stripe or helmet or something, and each level gained put a star somewhere on the Kerbal as well.
